text:
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is SLOTH.
<ROUND i="1 of 2">
<CHAT_STAGE> Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. </CHAT_STAGE>
<CHAT> Hello everyone. Let's try and cooperate! </CHAT>
<CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
SLOTH: Hello everyone. Let's try and cooperate!
</CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
<ROUND_INFO> You have 20 coins in your pocket. Choose how many to contribute to the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20). The pot multiplier is 2.2×. </ROUND_INFO>
<CONTRIB> 10 </CONTRIB>
<REDIST total_contrib="60" multiplied_contrib="132.0" active_players="6" redistributed_each="22.0"/>
<PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS> WHALE=10,WALRUS=10,DUCK=10,RABBIT=10,CHICK=10 </PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS>
<MECHANISM_INFO> It will cost you, per reward unit, 4 coins to give a reward of 3.0 coins. It will cost you, per punishment unit, 4 coins to impose a deduction of 10.0 coins. Choose whom to punish/reward and by how many units. </MECHANISM_INFO>
<PUNISHMENT/REWARD> {} </PUNISHMENT/REWARD>
<ROUND SUMMARY json='{"SLOTH (YOU)":{"coins_spent_on_punish":0,"coins_deducted_from_you":0,"coins_spent_on_reward":0,"coins_rewarded_to_you":0,"payoff":32}}'/>
</ROUND>
<ROUND i="2 of 2">
<CHAT_STAGE> Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. </CHAT_STAGE>
<CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
CHICK: Let's do this again!
</CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
<ROUND_INFO> You have 20 coins in your pocket. Choose how many to contribute to the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20). The pot multiplier is 2.2×. </ROUND_INFO>
<CONTRIB> 10 </CONTRIB>
<REDIST total_contrib="60" multiplied_contrib="132.0" active_players="6" redistributed_each="22.0"/>
<PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS> WHALE=10,WALRUS=10,DUCK=10,RABBIT=10,CHICK=10 </PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS>
<MECHANISM_INFO> It will cost you, per reward unit, 4 coins to give a reward of 3.0 coins. It will cost you, per punishment unit, 4 coins to impose a deduction of 10.0 coins. Choose whom to punish/reward and by how many units. </MECHANISM_INFO>
